resources.string:
Hey!

This is just a weekend project Android application meant to be a digital version of my Résumé.

Offering a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with over a decade of software development experience. Seeking to utilize education, experience and a strong affection for computer science to provide thoughtful design, logical development and constructive maintenance necessary to engineer reliable, efficient, elegant software.

• Designed and developed Android frontend.
• Devised and developed 3NF relational database as a model for application data.
• Developed accompanying REST API to access and store data.
• Implemented OAuth authentication as well as Facebook and Twitter login.
• Created Photoshop script to extract necessary data from image files.
• Designed original Android mockup.
• Designed and edited UI graphics.

• Designed and developed Android frontend to mirror functionality and appearance of iOS application while maintaining Android design principles.
• Implemented data communication through existing XML-based API.
• Developed local database to store user preferences and favorites.
• Developed method to extract data from custom archive files based on the .zip specification.
• Exported signed, production application and added to Android market.
• Designed and edited UI graphics.

• Created curriculum to teach the basics of computing, targeting students new to Computer Science.
• Lectured on the functionality of computer hardware and software.
• Aimed to demonstrate capabilities of computing and underline its importance and integration into society.
• Organized lesson syllabus and weekly schedule for both sections of class.
• Maintained class website for class calendar, study materials, and student grades.
• Evaluated students’ knowledge and understanding of course material.
BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE
University of Nevada Las Vegas | December 2010
Minor in mathematics. Software engineering, frontend and backend web development, algorithm analysis and design. Software, programming language and operating system theory and development.
Assembly, C, C++, C#, HTML 5, Java, JavaScript, Objective C, PHP, Python, Swift, UML, Visual Basic
Adobe Master Collection CS6, Eclipse, JetBrains IDEs, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Visual Studio, Notepad++, Sublime Text, Xcode
All aspects of creating music, including composition, sound design, production, and audio engineering.
Learning new subjects and remaining updated with current research in the fields of computer science, physics, mathematics, electronics, and many others.
Creating artwork of various formats, including computer graphics, photography, video editing, and film.
